channel.title: Smart Array on IT Talks
channel.description: Recent content in Smart Array on IT Talks

item.title: ESXi 5.5 threw PSOD, Raid controller driver
item.description: I have received PSOD several times at diferent esxi hosts DL180 G6 (esxi 5.5 hp + applied all patches build: 1892794). There is a known issue with the hpsa driver that can cause PSODs, you should update to the latest scsi-hpsa  5.5.0.60 version.
